title: Launch new apps tabs via keybindings

rules.description: left control + ` (backtick) - launches a new iTerm2 window with the default profile

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "iTerm"' -e 'if (app "iTerm" is running) then' -e 'tell current window' -e 'create tab with default profile' -e 'end tell' -e 'end if' -e 'activate' -e 'end tell'

rules.description: left control + 1 - launches a new Google Chrome window

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Google Chrome"' -e 'if (app "Google Chrome" is running) then make new tab at end of tabs of window 1' -e activate -e end

rules.description: left control + 2 - launches a new Safari window

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Safari"' -e 'if (app "Safari" is running) then' -e 'tell window 1' -e  'make new tab' -e 'end tell' -e 'end if' -e 'activate' -e 'end tell'
